name: Upsteer
description: Upsteer is an operations copilot for e-commerce brands that combines data across their business, enabling them to automate workflows from replenishment to wholesale operations and make the best decisions through task recommendations.
one_liner: Upsteer is an operations copilot for e-commerce brands that combines data across their business, enabling them to automate workflows from replenishment to wholesale operations and make the best decisions through task recommendations.
